etymology.value: ラテン語の「decorare」に由来。decor (美しさ、装飾)から派生。

verb_forms.present_indicative: decoro, decoras, decorat, decoramus, decoratis, decorant
verb_forms.imperfect_indicative: decorabam, decorabas, decorabat, decorabamus, decorabatis, decorabant
verb_forms.future_indicative: decorabo, decorabis, decorabit, decorabimus, decorabitis, decorabunt
verb_forms.perfect_indicative: decoravi, decoravisti, decoravit, decoravimus, decoravistis, decoraverunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_indicative: decoraveram, decoraveras, decoraverat, decoraveramus, decoraveratis, decoraverant
verb_forms.future_perfect_indicative: decoravero, decoraveris, decoraverit, decoraverimus, decoraveritis, decoraverint

usage_notes.explanation: ラテン語の動詞。現代語のdecorate(英語), décorer(フランス語), decorare(イタリア語)などの語源。
